specialAbilities.name: Deflect Missiles
specialAbilities.description: The bodyguard can use a reaction to deflect a ranged weapon attack that hits them. The attack is made at a disadvantage, and if the bodyguard succeeds on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 10 + half the attack's damage + the bodyguard's Dexterity modifier), the attack is deflected and the bodyguard takes no damage.

specialAbilities.name: Bodyguard's Ward
specialAbilities.description: The bodyguard can use their action to create a ward around a creature within 5 feet of them. The ward lasts for 1 minute, and the creature within the ward gains a +2 bonus to AC and Dexterity saving throws. The bodyguard can only have one ward active at a time.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
